My core personality traits, particularly Methodical and Integrity-driven, seem well-suited for maintaining these important relationships. There are whispers of instability affecting loan systems across Venice – perhaps something even I (low-status citizen) can't fully grasp yet.I look forward to seeing how my continued work might impact the Republic's overall economy and my own position within it, all while maintaining respect for hierarchy through honest labor performance as Facchino citizens are expected.
